page.title: 04PERTON FEATURES
page.content: The Shopping Centre at Anders Square is one of the main features of the Village.The Square includes several shops including; a Newsagents, a Post Office, a Freezer Centre, a Butchers, a Hairdressers, a Dry Cleaners, a Betting Shop, a Fish and Chip Shop, a Building Society and a Bank. Near to the Shopping Centre are the lakes. There is an island on the largest lake. Here one can see a great deal of wildlife-SWANS, Geese and Ducks. From the largest lake a stream leads off to the other smaller lake. The main road that runs round Perton Village is called The Parkway. From the Parkway you can head towards Wolverhampton on Wrottesley Park Road and towards the West Midlands.
